website_summaries.verdict: A fast-acting and long-lasting moisturizer full of essential ingredients for healthy skin.
pros: Absorbs quickly with no greasy or oily residue after applying
Can be used as a daytime moisturizer or for nighttime treatment
Don't need to apply much to get the job done
cons: For some, using too much can feel a bit heavy on the face

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer but I’m concerned that the one I received yesterday is a fake? Why is the bottle different?
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Markovich

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: I had received a small sample of this 1 year ago and have been hooked on it since. This moisturizer is unlike any I’ve ever used before, extremely lightweight but not mousse-like or fluffy like other moisturizers advertised as soft and light, this is more like a primer texture. It’s more expensive than I typically ever spend on facial products, but you truly only need a pea to a chickpea sized portion for it to be effective. My skin is prone to breakouts so I use a lot of products that tend to dry out my skin, but that hasn’t happened once since using Malin + Goetz.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stivers

customer_reviews.title: Underrated but freaking amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the most underrated moisturizer on the market and it's incredible. I have very sensitive and acne prone skin but this is the only moisturizer that has really worked and not broken my skin out. My skin is smoother and more youthful. It is worth every single dollar. A little goes along way.
customer_reviews.author: CNet

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and very sensitive skin and this is one of the few moisturizers that I can use. It’s fragrance free, a great moisturizer, doesn’t leave a thick film on your skin. It’s expensive but a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: thescvoyager

customer_reviews.title: best men’s moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: i’ve used a lot of moisturizers in my life and this is my fave. it’s expensive but a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer for combo skin!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my all time favorite day or night moisturizers. Leaves my skin soft and supple and just enough moisture. FYI- the pump from the larger size does fit on the same one!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole DiGuglielmo

customer_reviews.title: Check the size - 4oz is very expensive! I was shocked!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand! I have been using their products for years. Great brands should not raise prices during this time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: I really like this just wish it wasn’t so expensive. Doesn’t take much and like that skin doesn’t feel oily
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very little needed to moisturize entire face and I did not experience any greasy or oily residue after applying
customer_reviews.author: giuseppe giunta

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, light and non irritating. Great company and line of products
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is perfect. It is light, does not make my skin oily, yet definitely makes my face feel hydrated. I have sensitive skin and regularly visit the dermatologist. No breakouts or issues from using this lotion. Perfect daily use face lotion for after serum.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie

customer_reviews.title: Not same as picture
customer_reviews.text: The product that shipped is not the same in the picture. It doesn’t feel like the products I’ve used before. I’m just not sure about this and I’m not satisfied with this product given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A. Chio

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, the only moisturizer i can use on my face that moisturizes but doesnt clog & feel greasy. The grapefruit face wash is also one of my favorites
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and this moisturizer is perfect. It's light and makes my skin feel really soft without causing breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Kimkim123

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: The product is sticky and it made my acne prone skin breakout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: The only moisturizer I’ve found that adequately works on my combination skin without making it greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but I think mine is defective
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but mine came with little white slivers in it. Not sure what it is.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: So far this product from Malin & Goetz is far superior.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Rodan & Fields Smoothe Regimen for the last year at $175 per month. So far this product from Malin & Goetz is far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: This is your next moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been two nights since I’ve used this product but WOW it is out of this world! I actually found a set of four items (including this 4oz moisturizer) at Marshall’s for only $15 so I bought it not really knowing what quality it has just loving the price above everything at that moment. Well, I love it sooo much I will definitely be paying the $50 once I run out. Thank you thank you! It absorbs immediately, it makes your skin baby soft, it has a good scent, and it’s just so good.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't love this product but I also didn't hate it; it just simply wasn't as moisturizing as other products I already own. It didn't meet my high expectations. I would not recommend buying this but if you happen to get an opportunity to sample, I would before you commit to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I've searched for years for the right lotion. Too many would clog my pores and lead to acne. Others wouldn't sufficiently moisturize my skin. This product is the perfect balance to solving both problems. Moreover, a little lotion will go a long way, so while it's a bit more expensive than other lotions, the bottle goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M Harper

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I loved this moisturizer a little bit goes a long way to begin with. The smell is a little minty to me, it left my skin feeling soft and very hydrated. I didn't experience any break outs using this
customer_reviews.author: RBG

product_meta.title: Malin + Goetz Vitamin E Face Moisturizer — balancing + nourishing for ALL skin types. multitasks as a hydrating serum, anti aging face lotion, after shave, makeup primer. cruelty-free + vegan, 4 Fl oz
product_meta.description:
everyday essential. Our residue-free moisturizer scientifically synthesizes natural anti-oxidants vitamins e and b5 and soothing chamomile with absorbent fatty acids. Effectively and gently hydrates and balances all skin types, unlike traditionally greasy pore-clogging oils, for an intensely nourishing treatment, reducing epidermal irritation for the most sensitive of skin. Perfect foundation for immediate make-up application. Natural fragrance and color. for all skin types. • normal/combination skin feels hydrated and balanced without residue. • oily skin benefits from residue free hydration and nourishment. • dry skin feels intensely hydrated and effectively nourished all day upon application. benefits. This multi-tasking moisturizer is an instant base for make-up application and as a daily-use, soothing after shave for men. We’re excited to let you know we’re in the process of going back to our roots. We’re making a return to single-color packaging design we launched MALIN+GOETZ with 15 years ago. Don’t worry… the formulas you know + love will remain the same.

BRAND STORY
malin+goetz

BRAND_DESCRIPTION
Malin + Goetz combines natural ingredients with advanced technology to create uncomplicated skincare. Our products are gentle and effective for all skin types and genders. Made locally in New York and cruelty-free.

See more
